content: p1 rib for 9 row or 1 ½ inches row 10 rs k1 p1 2 4 times k to last 4 8 sts p1 k1 2 4 times row 11 ws p1 k1 2 4 times p to last 4 8 sts k1 p1 2 4 times repeat last 2 row until panel measures 4 5 inches ending after a ws row decrease row rs k1 p1 2 4 times ssk knit to last 6 10 sts k2tog p1 k1 2 4 times 23 29 sts repeat decrease row every other rs row 3 4 times 17 21 sts next rs row k1 p1 2 4 times ssk 2 1 times k1 1 k2tog 2 1 times p1 k1 2 4 times 13 19 sts next row ws beginning with p1 work in k1 p1 rib for 9 row or 1 ½ inches bind off all sts in rib pattern finishing begin sewing top of ribbing on the tummy panel to the neck ribbing on the back panel count down 22 28 row and attach the rest of the tummy panel to the back panel leg openings are now complete weave in ends all text and images property of joann rogers and jojo knits all rights reserved 2012
